description: Tristan Scott is a good ol' country boy with southern charm and a bit of a wild streak running through him. A bit of a bad boy, Tristan is nonetheless eager and willing to please, whether he's helping you fix that fence or just kicking around and relaxing. An avid gym-rat, Tristan shows off his rippling chest and beautiful physique as he runs his fingers along the shelf of weights, before ultimately reclining on the weight bench to relieve himself of some built up tension. Smacking himself on the ass, he runs his hands up and down his chiseled body, steadying his hands around his cock as he begins to work up a load, launching it from his rock hard cock as it splashes all over his naturally hairy chest, giving all new meaning to the term 'Southern Comfort'.Enjoy!
title: Tristan Scott
